oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Thermal Weed Control
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ascard, J.
Hatcher, P.E.
Melander, B.
Upadhyaya, M.K.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This chapter reviews the major findings on thermal weed control for field crops
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Ascard, J.; Hatcher, P.E.; Melander, B. and Upadhyaya, M.K. (2007) Thermal Weed Control. In: Upadhyaya, M.K. and Blackshaw, R.E. (Eds.) CAB International 2007. Non-chemical Weed Management. CAB International, chapter 10, pp. 155-175.
